alert.note: Alert for South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 25 at 2:42AM MST until December 25 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HEAVY SNOW EXPECTED FOR THE MOUNTAINS TODAY THROUGH SATURDAY MORNING... ...Winter conditions for the I-80 Summit, Buford and Vedauwoo this Morning... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow. Total snow accumulation between 1 and 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph may produce some blowing snow and lower visibility. * WHERE...Pumpkin Vine, Vedauwoo, and Buford. * WHEN...Until 8 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Gusty winds to 45 mph will also produce some blowing snow and lower visibility.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills
